content.question: Some of the equipotential curves in a region of space are shown, with their respective electric potential values labeled. Which of the following claims is correct about the direction of the electric field at Point <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>?

choices.label: The electric field is directed to the right.
The electric field is directed to the left.
The electric field is directed straight up.
The electric field is directed straight down.

content.answer: The electric field is directed to the right.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
